title: Requires on-line or web-based applications utilized by the department of education to comply with Cyber Security Policy and with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
summary: Requires that any on-line or web-based applications utilized by the department of education in connection with application for licensure or certification or to verify the result of background checks comply with the Cyber Security Policy of the New York State Office of Cyber Security and Critical Infrastructure Coordination and with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring that any on-line or web-based applications utilized by the department of education in connection with application for licensure or certification or to verify the result of background checks comply with the Cyber Security Policy of the New York State Office of Cyber Security and Critical Infrastructure Coordination and with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
